ads_1.CN: {RED}[X社区] {LIME}!store {DEFAULT}购买使用皮肤 {LIME}!inv {DEFAULT}打开商店个人库存 (如果您想装备皮肤!inv更合适)
ads_1.US: {RED}[X Community] {LIME}!store {DEFAULT}to buy and use skins {LIME}!inv {DEFAULT}to open your inventory (use !inv to equip skins)

ads_3.CN: {RED}[X社区] {PURPLE}欢迎加入X社区僵尸逃跑QQ群：{LIGHTPURPLE}606809103 {PURPLE}萌新玩家请访问官方论坛 {ORANGE}bbs.upkk.com {PURPLE}交流讨论游戏相关内容，并查看社区规则与最新活动。
ads_3.US: {RED}[X Community] {PURPLE}Join the X Community Zombie Escape QQ group: {LIGHTPURPLE}606809103 {PURPLE}New players, please visit the official forum {ORANGE}bbs.upkk.com {PURPLE}for discussions and to check the community rules and latest events.

ads_4.CN: {RED}[X社区] {BLUE}地图指挥流程中请勿插麦、卡麦、喧哗，违者将受到管理员处罚！
ads_4.US: {RED}[X Community] {BLUE}Please do not interrupt or speak over the map commands, offenders will be punished by the admins!

ads_5.CN: {RED}[X社区] {LIME}不喜欢当前地图？聊天框输入 {LIGHTPURPLE}!RTV {LIME}或按 {LIGHTPURPLE}Z-9-8 {LIME}快捷指令进行投票更换！
ads_5.US: {RED}[X Community] {LIME}Don't like the current map? Type {LIGHTPURPLE}!RTV {LIME}or press {LIGHTPURPLE}Z-9-8 {LIME}to vote for a change!

ads_6.CN: {RED}[X社区] {LIME}按Z键（默认无线电按键）使用快捷指令
ads_6.US: {RED}[X Community] {LIME}Press Z (default radio key) to use quick commands

ads_7.CN: {RED}[X社区] {PURPLE} 如果您需要开启神器hud 则可以输入 {LIME}!ehud 3 开启 !ehud 0 关闭 也可通过!ehud_pos x y z 数值调整位置(默认为 {ORANGE}!ehud_pos 80 50 50)
ads_7.US: {RED}[X Community] {PURPLE}If you need to enable the HUD, enter {LIME}!ehud 3 to enable, !ehud 0 to disable. You can also adjust the position with !ehud_pos x y z (default: {ORANGE}!ehud_pos 80 50 50)
